short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An alert extension for Redmine tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds an alerting feature to the open source "Redmine"  (https://www.redmine.org/) project management web application.

Select a drop down field and an expected value - you'll be notified when the criteria is triggered according to your personal settings.
